title: How the Left’s Tyranny Can Be Undone | Guest: John Schroder | 10/10/22
description:
Glenn and Pat share some good news about people standing up against the woke Left, including PayPal backtracking on its misinformation policy and the Vanderbilt clinic suspending gender transitioning surgery on minors. Glenn and Pat discuss New York City Mayor Eric Adams declaring a state of emergency over the influx of bused migrants. Louisiana state Treasurer John Schroder joins to explain why he’s removing $700 million from BlackRock funds. A 17-year-old girl suffered a heart attack in her sleep. What could be the reason? Glenn previews his latest podcast with author Mattias Desmet, discussing mass formation and the psychology of totalitarianism. How many more pro-life activists will be targeted by the FBI? Glenn reviews the biblical context behind the phrase, "Let he who is without sin cast the first stone."
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
